Julian and Crystal,

 

At the end of February, Customer Service received a request that you wanted to increase your service to have all (3) of your trash compactor bins on schedule, but you wanted to have your smaller 2yd trash compactor bin removed, and replaced with a 4yd trash compactor bin.

 

Unfortunately, those compactor bins are specially fabricated to work with the machines.  We do not stock them, and do not know if/when we would have any additional 4yd to provide.  At the time that your property was onboarded, you received (2) 4yd trash bins and (1) 2yd trash bin, because that was all that we had available to work with your machine.

 

We are unable to provide a larger 4yd trash bin.  Our only option is to deliver back that smaller 2yd trash bin that I believe was removed back on 3/3 (if it was removed, can you confirm?).  We can put that on a schedule, and/or we can also increase the # of pickups you receive, but unfortunately we cannot provide any additional 4yd bins at this time.

 

If you do want additional compactor containers, another option would be to purchase or lease them from an alternate vendor.
